tree.name: Max Christie
tree.tradeDescription: Dallas acquired Christie, Anthony Davis and a 2029 1st from Lakers for Luka Doncic
tree.note: Michigan State guard, 2022 #35 pick by Los Angeles Lakers

assetsGivenUp.name: Luka Doncic
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Atlanta traded #3 pick (Doncic) to Dallas for #5 pick (Trae Young) and a protected 2019 first-round pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Real Madrid guard, drafted #3 by Atlanta, traded to Dallas on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: Trae Young
assetsGivenUp.note: Oklahoma guard, drafted #5 by Dallas, sent to Atlanta in draft-night swap

assetsGivenUp.name: 2019 DAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Protected first-round pick sent to Atlanta, became #10 overall
